projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Hungry, Humble, Honest, with Heart.

The Opportunity

Here you will get an opportunity to work in all roles including (but not limited to) working on the core data path, platform deployment, data protection and replication, Linux kernel development, application programming, user interfaces.

Engineering / R&D at Nutanix

Nutanix engineers are creating revolutionary technology: building a software-defined data center. We're using our love of programming and outstanding backgrounds to change the way companies virtualize their data centers. At Nutanix, you'll find no shortage of challenging problems to work on. We work closely with our product in a collegiate, collaborative environment that encourages the open exploration of ideas. We are looking for smart people who can learn and contribute to our space of cutting-edge innovation, irrespective of background. Come make an impact.

Your Role

  • Design & develop a world-class enterprise-grade hybrid/multi-cloud platform that is distributed, scalable, resilient, and highly performant at a large-scale deployment.
  • Contribute to all phases of product development right from conception, design, implementation, and deployment along with performance engineering.
  • Design a robust system, and write code & unit tests to produce high-quality, reusable, and extensible software through an API-first approach along with consumer-grade user interface.
  • Design and implement scalable and reliable automation and test frameworks to enable the delivery of high-quality software in an agile environment.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including other Developers, Testers, Product Management, and Support to meet customer requirements while driving engineering innovation.




What You Will Bring

  • BE/BTech/ME/MTech or equivalent in Computer Science
  • 0 years of software development experience
  • Strong command over languages such as C/C++/Java/Golang/Javascript/Python especially in the areas of advanced memory management and multi-threaded techniques is a huge plus.
  • Strong fundamentals in Operating Systems, Distributed Systems, Databases - Relational and Document, file systems, Multi-threaded/Multi-Process applications, and inter-process communications.
  • Familiarity with Linux Kernel Internals & Open Source will be an added advantage.
  • Strong fundamentals in Object-Oriented Programming, Algorithms, Data Structures, and Problem Solving
  • Knowledge of networking/virtualization/containers/cloud and contribution to open-source software is a huge plus
  • Location: Bangalore / Pune (based on business requirements)
